      • read

        public Document read(InputStream inputStream)
        Read a single document from an Inputstream, assumes UTF-8 encoding.

        Remarks: This method consumes the stream, and closes it after successful read.

        Parameters:
        inputStream - inputstream to read from
        Returns:
        Document or null if no document was found.

      • read

        public Document read(Reader reader)
        Reads everything into one document from a Reader

        Remarks: This method consumes the reader, and closes it after successful read.

        Parameters:
        reader - reader to read from
        Returns:
        Document or null if no document was found.
